Topic.Title: The room the player spawns in displays objects in text-area as well as the inventory.

Posts.EditableText:
if you don't want the Objects displayed in the text-area, you can toggle this feature/option off:

specifically/individually (for a specific object):

'whatever' Object -> 'Room Description' Tab -> ~ 'automatically generate items' feature/option -> uncheck it

or globally (for all objects):

'game' Game Object -> 'Features' Tab -> ~ 'automatically generate items' feature/option -> uncheck it
